question:
You and your friends ate a meal at a restaurant to celebrate a special occasion, and you were extremely disssatisfied with the experience.

Write a letter to the restaurant manager. In your letter: Explain the reason for the celebration Give details of your visit to the restaurant Say what you would like the restaurant to do
text: This letter is being written to express my dissatisfaction with the meal that I and my friend had at your restaurant last Thursday. I am hoping that you take the necessary action to improve your food quality and service In order to maintain your reputation.

Is along with my friend went to your restaurant around Fooddock to celebrate the completion of our postgraduate degree with first grade; Supposing it to be a memorable time 1/200 had a frustrating experience because of many reasons. First of all, we adored two servings of vegetarian fried rice, but we were shocked to observe that the rice was undercooked and had a pungent odour. Also, when we complained about for same to the waitress she didn't pay much attention to this. You can understand my, frustration when I and my friend had to leave the Crestowant empty stomach and with utter disappointment.

My intention in writing this letter is to ask you to issue a Show Cause Notice to the supervisor at your restaurant and disseminate instructions to all your staff to maintain  decorum. Please provide the best possible meals, dining experience and efficient waiters to your customers.
I look forward to hearing from you.
